about_the_game:
Exact Erotic Revenge on Your Former Bully!

[Your Chance for Payback Has Arrived!]

• Face your past tormentor who once ruined your as an unexpected truth comes to light.
• Master the art of sensual massage to captivate her and train her as your personal plaything.

[Choose Your Massage Techniques and Lead Her to Ecstasy]

• Watch as the initially haughty heroine's attitude shifts as you gain the upper hand in your relationship.
• Elevate your dominance through exquisite massage experiences.
• Select massage areas from the heroine's profile chart.
• As your skills improve, massage duration extends and more areas become accessible.

[Fine-tune Your Massage with Mouse Controls]

• Synchronize your timing and mouse movements to deliver the most pleasurable experience.
• Beware: touching sensitive areas too soon may trigger her anger meter!
• Choose from three difficulty levels: NORMAL / HARD / SUPER HARD

[Experience the Heroine's Gradual Transformation]

• Witness the evolution of your relationship as the core gameplay element.
• The heroine's attitude and attire change based on your growing influence.
• Multiple endings await based on your level of dominance.

[Maximize Your Massage Session]

• Each body part allows for 15 minutes of massage time.
• Time decreases with each action you perform.
• Different techniques affect the heroine's emotional gauge.
• Her reactions evolve as your relationship deepens, turning initial reluctance into acceptance.

[Stunning Visuals and Smooth Animations]

• Features 420 unique facial expressions for the heroine.
• Utilizes Live2D technology for fluid, lifelike movements during massages.
• Immerse yourself in the heroine's ever-changing expressions – a key highlight of the game!

Indulge in this tantalizing game of revenge and seduction. Will you succeed in turning your former bully into your willing pet?

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, sexual assault/non-consensual sex, Violence, General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.

name: MASSAGE MY EX-BULLY

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN10/WIN11
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN10/WIN11
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Turn the tables on your bully through seduction! Change the dynamic of your relationship with exquisite massage techniques, and make the heroine fall head over heels for you. Transform her into your willing plaything in this tantalizing adventure of revenge and romance.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
